abstract.text: A type for an event that indicates the retrieval of a task’s control port.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: This event represents a process that obtains a send right to a task control port, formerly known as a “task port”. Operations that obtain a send right include
, and certain debugging and DTrace operations.
For more information on ports and port rights, see the “Ports, Port Rights, Port Sets, and Port Namespaces” section of

abstract.text: Develop system extensions that enhance user security.
A type for an event that indicates the retrieval of a task’s inspect port.
A type for an event that indicates the retrieval of a task’s name port.
A type for an event that indicates the retrieval of a task’s read port.
A type for an event that indicates the retrieval of a task’s control port.
An unused field reserved for future use.
The process targeted by this event.
